20110120065014.000|20110120065017.000|CC1|YOU SPENT A YEAR WATCHING SOME  
20110120065017.000|20110120065020.000|CC1|GENTLEMEN IN MICHIGAN PACK UP A 
20110120065020.000|20110120065021.000|CC1|STAMPING PLANT.                 
20110120065021.000|20110120065023.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20110120065023.000|20110120065025.000|CC1|FOR ABOUT 11 MONTHS, I WENT AS  
20110120065025.000|20110120065026.000|CC1|OFTEN AS I COULD TO THE BUD     
20110120065026.000|20110120065028.000|CC1|PLANT, WHICH IS ON THE EAST SIDE
20110120065028.000|20110120065028.000|CC1|OF DETROIT.                     
20110120065028.000|20110120065030.000|CC1|IT WAS BUILT IN 1919.           
20110120065030.000|20110120065031.000|CC1|A RICH HISTORY.                 
20110120065031.000|20110120065033.000|CC1|ITS CLAIM TO FAME WAS IN THE 19 
20110120065033.000|20110120065034.000|CC1|FICHTs IT STAMPED AND           
20110120065034.000|20110120065036.000|CC1|ASSEMBLED THE BODY OF THE FORD  
20110120065036.000|20110120065038.000|CC1|THUNDERBIRD, AS ICONIC A CAR AS 
20110120065038.000|20110120065039.000|CC1|DETROIT PRODUCED IN THE 20th    
20110120065039.000|20110120065040.000|CC1|CENTURY.

20110120065042.000|20110120065044.000|CC1|CLOSING IN 2006, I THOUGHT THAT 
20110120065044.000|20110120065047.000|CC1|MIGHT BE A NICE WAY TO GET INTO 
20110120065047.000|20110120065049.000|CC1|THE TOPIC I WANTED TO WRITE     
20110120065049.000|20110120065050.000|CC1|ABOUT, BLUE COLLAR DECLINE AND  
20110120065050.000|20110120065051.000|CC1|UNEMPLOYMENT PROBLEMS AND SO ON.
20110120065051.000|20110120065052.000|CC1|>> Jon:  WHICH MAKES SENSE.
